activities: International SOS and its group of US companies provide medical assistance, travel security and concierge services to corporate and individual clients. For that purpose International SOS and its group of US companies may collect information related to travel itineraries and limited health information used only for the purpose of rendering assistance. Personal information is collected directly from individuals when they choose to provide to International SOS or one of its Group Companies including MedAire Inc, International SOS Assistance Inc, Aspire Lifestyles Inc or International SOS Government Services, Inc with their personal information by subscribing to products or services sold by one of the entities of International SOS.
contactoff1: 111, Town Square Place, Suite 415, Jersey City
